subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: After seven horses were entered Wednesday for Saturday’s Belmont, Curlin was installed as the 6-5 morning-line favorite, reflective of his status as the nation’s top 3-year-old.
snippet: After seven horses were entered Wednesday for Saturday’s Belmont, Curlin was installed as the 6-5 morning-line favorite, reflective of his status as the nation’s top 3-year-old.
